overview: Love once begun, cannot be stopped.  The greatest dancer of all time, Bang (Kim Gi-soo) falls in dangerous love with his student. Detectives misunderstand their relationship and start chasing after them. They run into a mysterious couple in the a guest house they stumble upon while running away from the detectives. They share passionate love in their hideout but even the mysterious owner watches them from afar!
title: Dancer Kim's Teaching
